mapper.insert: INSERT INTO internsc.tb_ctn ( tpl_cd, src_cd, img_grp_id, ctn_nm, dsp_st_dt, dsp_end_dt, ctn_div, dsp_yn, cmt_yn, cst_yn, pop_msg, view_cnt, reg_dt, mod_dt, use_yn ) VALUES ( #{tplCd}, #{srcCd}, #{imgGrpId}, #{ctnNm}, to_timestamp(#{dspStDt}||' 00:00:00.000','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_timestamp(#{dspEndDt}||' 23:59:59.999','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{ctnDiv}, #{dspYn}, #{cmtYn}, #{cstYn}, #{popMsg}, 0, #{regDt}, #{modDt}, 'y' )

INSERT INTO internsc.tb_img ( img_grp_id, img_ty_cd, path, fe_nm, enc_fe_nm, fe_ext, fe_sz, reg_dt, mod_dt, use_yn, img_odr ) VALUES ( #{imgGrpId}, #{imgTyCd}, #{path}, #{feNm}, #{encFeNm}, #{feExt}, #{feSz}, #{regDt}, #{modDt}, #{useYn}, #{imgOdr} )
INSERT INTO internsc.tb_ctn_det ( ctn_seq, img_grp_id, tpl_cd, url_addr, reg_dt, mod_dt, use_yn ) VALUES ( #{ctnSeq}, #{imgGrpId}, #{tplCd}, #{urlAddr}, #{regDt}, #{modDt}, #{useYn} )
mapper.select: SELECT ctn_seq FROM internsc.tb_ctn WHERE img_grp_id = #{imgGrpId}
